Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 8, 21, 31 to 44, 46 to 54 (see s. 60(2)), ss. 63, 64(3) and 66(1) (see s. 66(2)), ss. 67 to 90, 91(1), 92(1) and 93(1) (see ss. 91(2), 92(2) and 93(2)), ss. 94, 96 to 99 and 79.02 to 79.05 of the Excise Tax Act, as enacted by ss. 100(1) and (3), ss. 103 to 116, ss. 161.3 and 161.4 of the Income Tax Act, as enacted by s. 117(1), 117(3) and (4) and ss. 118 to 130 in force on assent 19.06.2003
— ss. 9, 11 and 13 in force 01.08.2003 see s. 14(1)
— ss. 10 and 12 deemed in force 01.08.2002 see s. 14(2)
— ss. 15 to 20 and 22 to 29 in force 04.01.2004 see SI/2003-185
— ss. 45 and 55 to 58 deemed in force 18.06.2002 see s. 60(1) and (3)
— ss. 61(1) and 62(1) deemed in force 19.02.2003 see s. 61(2) and 62(2)
— ss. 64(1) and 65(1) deemed in force 17.12.1990 see ss. 64(2) and 65(2)

— s. 95(1), ss. 78 to 79.01 of the Excise Tax Act, as enacted by s. 100(1), ss. 101(1) to (3), 102(1), and s. 161.2 of the Income Tax Act, as enacted by s. 117(1), in force 01.07.2003 see ss. 95(2), 100(2), 101(4), 102(2) and 117(2)
See also various provisions throughout re application

CIF.Text: CIF, 2005, c. 19, ss. 56(1) to (4) are deemed in force 19.06.2003 see s. 56(5)
